source_sentence: 我由染欲深過患　　墮於無間地獄中　蒙佛恩力得生天　　復令證得涅盤道　我由依止淨法眼　　永脫輪迴諸惡趣　及彼未來生死流　　得至寂靜菩提岸　我今得見牟尼主　　百千生中難值遇　善超生老病苦因　　應受世間廣供養　持寶瓔珞以奉獻　　合掌右繞心忻慶　故我頂禮二足尊　　能使人天生覺悟福蓋正行所集經卷第五
translation: "Because of my deep misdeeds of defiled desire, I fell into the unremitting hell. By the Buddha's grace, I was born in heaven and made to realize the path to nirvāṇa. Because I relied on the pure eye of the Dharma, I was forever freed from the bad destinies of transmigration and the streams of future birth-and-death and was able to reach the shore of tranquil enlightenment. Now, I've come to see Lord Muni, a rare encounter in a hundred thousand lifetimes who well transcends the causes of birth, old age, illness, and suffering and should receive the world's extensive offerings, carry a jeweled necklace to present to him, fold my palms, circumambulate him to the right, and rejoice with my heart. Therefore, I salute the two-legged honored one who causes humans to be born with innate awakening and fortune, and who correctly practices what's gathered in Sutra Scroll 5.
